name: Python
description: Python is a versatile and easy-to-learn programming language often used for web development, data analysis, and more.

name: JavaScript
description: JavaScript is a widely-used language for web development, enabling dynamic and interactive web applications .

name: Java
description: Java is a popular, platform-independent language often used for building desktop and mobile applications.

name: C++
description: C++ is a powerful, high-performance language used in systems programming, game development, and more.

name: Ruby
description: Ruby is known for its elegant syntax and is commonly used for web development with the Ruby on Rails framework.

name: Swift
description: Swift is Apple's programming language for iOS and macOS app development, known for its speed and safety features.

name: PHP
description: PHP is a server-side scripting language widely used for web development.

name: C#
description: C# is a language developed by Microsoft, used for Windows application development and game development with Unity.

name: Go
description: Go, also known as Golang, is a statically typed language designed for simplicity and efficiency.

name: Rust
description: Rust is a systems programming language known for its safety features and performance.

name: Scala
description: Scala is a functional and object-oriented language that runs on the Java Virtual Machine (JVM).

name: Kotlin
description: Kotlin is a modern, statically typed language that's officially supported for Android app development.

name: Perl
description: Perl is a flexible, text-processing language used for various purposes, including web development and system administration.

name: Haskell
description: Haskell is a purely functional language known for its strong type system and expressive syntax.

name: TypeScript
description: TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript that adds static typing and other features for large-scale web development projects.

name: Lua
description: Lua is a lightweight, embeddable scripting language used in game development and other applications.

name: Elixir
description: Elixir is a functional, concurrent language built on the Erlang VM, known for building highly scalable systems.

name: Dart
description: Dart is a language developed by Google, primarily used for building web and mobile apps with the Flutter framework.

name: R
description: R is a language and environment for statistical computing and graphics, commonly used in data analysis and research.

name: Erlang
description: Erlang is a concurrent, functional language designed for building highly available and fault-tolerant systems.

name: Perl 6
description: Perl 6 is the next major version of Perl, offering enhanced features and expressiveness.

name: COBOL
description: COBOL is a language used for business, finance, and administrative systems, known for its longevity.

name: Ada
description: Ada is a structured, statically typed language used in safety-critical systems and aerospace applications.

name: Prolog
description: Prolog is a logic programming language often used for artificial intelligence and expert systems.

name: Lisp
description: Lisp is known for its unique parenthetical syntax and is often used in artificial intelligence and symbolic computing.
